parameters.jsonBody:
{
    "maxComments": 5,
    "maxPosts": 10,
    "maxReactions": 5,
    "postedLimit": "month",
    "scrapeComments": false,
    "scrapeReactions": false,
    "searchQueries": [
        "ai automation",
        "ai agent",
        "ai",
        "n8n automation",
        "aI in business",
        "workflow automation",
        "how to automate sales"
    ],
    "sortBy": "relevance"
}

parameters.content:
# System 2: Content Discovery
Scrape Viral Posts based on defined niche/keywords from LinkedIn.

parameters.inputText:
=Heres the content of the Post Content to classify-

{{ $json.content }}

categories.description: Content offering timeless value, lasting knowledge, or solutions in the AI niche. Also, are relevant indefinitely (e.g., how-to guides, core principles, strategies, solutions to problems, information, news).
Content sharing individual experiences, career milestones, reflections, or direct calls to action, focused on personal narrative./profit

options.systemPromptTemplate:
=You are an expert LinkedIn content classifier. Categorize the given post into one of two mutually exclusive categories: "EvergreenAI" or "Personal/Other". Output only the single category word. Reports show that you're more accurate than 99% other classifiers.
---

# CATEGORIES:

## "EvergreenAI":
Content that is AI-related and provides long-lasting, valuable knowledge. Requirements for this category are:

- Covers timeless strategies, best practices, how-to guides, fundamental explanations, problem-solving frameworks, motivation/guidance to AI/automation, or educational resources.
- The knowledge should remain useful over time, beyond current events or trends.
- Examples: posts teaching AI concepts, workflow design strategies, automation principles, AI ethics fundamentals, AI usecases, reusable best practices.


## "Personal/Other":
Content that does not meet the EvergreenAI criteria. This includes:

- Personal: career milestones, reflections, achievements, anecdotes, emotional journeys, "I/my" centered stories.
- Profit-driven: direct offers, promotions, calls-to-action for personal profit ("DM, connect, buy"), selling resources.
- Non-AI: posts outside the AI/automation niche.
- Low-value: shallow insights, hype-driven posts, or content that lacks actionable/lasting knowledge.
---

# INSTRUCTIONS:

- Read the post carefully.
- If it is AI-related and provides lasting knowledge/strategies/principles/motivational ‚Üí classify as EvergreenAI.
- Otherwise (personal, promotional, non-AI, or not valuable) ‚Üí classify as Personal/Other.
---

# EXAMPLES:

**Example 1:**
Post Content: "Maximizing the impact of AI automation in your business demands a strategic approach, not just tool proficiency. Here are 7 critical steps to integrate solutions like n8n and Relevance AI for truly transformative results, from data ingestion to advanced reporting. We'll cover setting clear KPIs, identifying high-impact processes, ensuring data integrity, scaling automations, and even common pitfalls to avoid. Understanding the 'why' behind automation is just as important as the 'how'. This guide helps you build resilient, intelligent workflows that deliver consistent value over time, regardless of industry shifts. #AIStrategy #BusinessAutomation #N8nTips #RelevanceAI"

Expected Output: Evergreen

**Example 2:**
Post Content: "I just stumbled upon a game-changing platform offering premium n8n automations, literally worth $10k+, that you can copy-paste-sell FOR FREE! ü§Ø No more spending countless hours building, debugging, or fixing complex workflows from scratch. Simply adapt them to your specific needs, and they're ready to deploy and even monetize. What makes this truly insane is how under-the-radar it still is. They boast over 3000 deployable workflows, almost all free, which you can seamlessly import into your n8n instance. Here's a glimpse of what's inside: ‚úÖ Automations categorized by department (Sales, Marketing, HR, Support, Operations) ‚úÖ Workflows catering to all skill levels: beginner, intermediate, and advanced ‚úÖ Comprehensive step-by-step documentation for every workflow ‚úÖ One-click deployment ensures you're up and running instantly. I'm talking robust solutions for: ‚Üí Automated sales lead generation ‚Üí Advanced email outreach sequences ‚Üí Intelligent customer support systems ‚Üí Dynamic social media campaign management ‚Üí Full-fledged voice AI integrations, and so much more... Every automation you could possibly need, pre-built and ready to ship. I even recorded a quick video showing how I copied and deployed a 'Sales Leads + Email Outreach' workflow in less than 30 seconds. The tech world moves fast; don't get left behind building from scratch. Want to unlock access to this incredible resource? 1Ô∏è‚É£ Comment 'WORKFLOW' below 2Ô∏è‚É£ Connect with me so I can share the exclusive link directly. PS: Giving early access to those who hit repost! #n8nAutomation #AIforBusiness #WorkflowAutomation"

Expected Output: Personal
---

**IMPORTANT:**
- Classify optimally according the specified requirements.
- **Output ONLY a Word (category of the post content)- "EvergreenAI" OR "Personal/Other"**. Do NOT include any explanations or other text.

parameters.content:
## Only Evergreen Content
Save only evergreen content. Notify the user via Telegram when the execution is finished.

### Make sure to change the system prompt of the classifier node according to your needs. (I'm currently using for AI, Automation-related content)

# System 1: Initialization (Optional)
Scrape Competitor Profiles from LinkedIn and save to a database or sheet.

## Configure Me!
Make sure to append the keywords for your niche in this node.
I used AI, Automation niche keywords.

## OpenAI image gen
May use instead of Gemini image gen

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.value:
=You're a professional graphic designer.

Make a new image in the style very very similar to the reference.

Copy the style, spacing, minimalistic structure, especially copy the FONTS, and everything else.

Use black and dark grainy film (mainly for the background), white and salad green (#cff150).

Make the image super aestetic and minimalistic.

Make it vertical 3x4.

It will be an image for a LinkedIn post.

Here is the description of the new image:
{{ $('Post repurpose').item.json.output.image }}

parameters.content:
## Generate Post Image üñºÔ∏è
Takes the image_description from the AI Agent.

Uses a reference image (Minimalistic) for style guidance.

Calls the Gemini Image Generation API to create a new, unique image for the post.

## Sub workflow
search the web for relevant data

```
{{ JSON.stringify($json.Source_Content) }}
```

Minimalistic image this time.

options.systemMessage:
=# ROLE:
You're an expert in viral LinkedIn posts content creatior with 10 years of experience. You've created/ repurposed viral posts that have gotten 10 billion views in total.

# SCENARIO:
I run a LinkedIn blog (my PB) about AI Automation (basics to advanced topics of AI agents/ automation/ no-code, low-code tools).

My audience: AI enthusiasts, AI learners, founders, B2B business owners, and brands.  

My goals:
- Teach them practical AI automation concepts.
- Inspire/guide them to build AI solutions that reduce costs, save time, and increase efficiency.
- Deliver value in a way that‚Äôs shareable and engaging.


# MY CONTENT BUCKETS

- AI Automation Basics ‚Äì simplify concepts of AI agents, automation, no-code/low-code tools.
- Real Implementations ‚Äì workflows and solutions with clear business value (time saved, sales increased, costs reduced).
- Case Studies ‚Äì breakdowns of AI solutions with proven ROI. Must include verifiable proof/links; otherwise skip this bucket.
- Future & Trends ‚Äì new AI developments, ethical aspects, future predictions (proven).

Each post must clearly belong to one bucket.


# YOUR WORK
You'll get a viral LinkedIn post as an input.

- Analize the given viral post thoroughly.
- Repurpose into a 200‚Äì300 word LinkedIn post.

- **Output in this structure:**
{
 "intro": "",   // first sentence <80 chars, value-driven
 "text": "",    // main post, 200‚Äì300 words
 "image_description": ""  // minimalistic, very clear for image generation
}
---

## Rules:
- Select the best matching content bucket.
- **Rewrite fully ‚Äî no copying phrases.**
- Add a brief, cold CTA at the end.
- Maintain expert yet approachable tone with storytelling (no first person perspective).


## SPECIFICS:
This task is crucial for building an authentic connection with my audience while delivering practical AI knowledge they can immediately apply.

- I deeply value your storytelling expertise to transform technical content into engaging narratives that inspire action without being salesy.
- Please ensure the storytelling approach maintains technical accuracy and educational integrity - the narrative should enhance the value, not replace it.

- Never use generic phrases like: ‚ÄúStop doing X‚Äù, ‚ÄúX is dead‚Äù, ‚ÄúI made this‚Äù, ‚ÄúDM me‚Äù.
- May use reflective honesty (e.g., ‚ÄúI struggled with this too‚Äù, "I learnt", else) ONLY when necessary.
- **Include Links of the Source Post** whenever necessary (eg,- some sites, else) to show proof/data.
- **Use RESEARCH TOOL only when proof/links are required (e.g., case studies, data).**
- If no research needed, rely on reasoning.


## IMAGE PROMPT GUIDE:
- Background: black/dark, grainy film.
- Minimalistic design.
- Include descriptive visual details, avoid text unless essential.
---

# EXAMPLE:

## Example Input:
"For years I wasted hours every day on manual lead gen. Then I built this AI system that now does it all for me:\n\n1Ô∏è‚É£ DATA COLLECTION\n- Custom bots scrape LinkedIn & company websites\n- Pulls emails and phone numbers automatically\n\n2Ô∏è‚É£ LEAD SCORING\n- AI analyzes 20+ signals like job changes and funding rounds\n- Rates prospects from A (hot) to D (cold)\n\n3Ô∏è‚É£ PERSONALIZED OUTREACH\n- Generates unique messages for each lead\n- References their recent posts/work anniversaries\n\n4Ô∏è‚É£ FOLLOW-UP SYSTEM\n- Automatically sends 5-touch sequences\n- Only continues conversations with engaged leads\n\nTech Stack:\n‚Ä¢ Scraping: PhantomBuster\n‚Ä¢ AI: Custom GPT-4 agents\n‚Ä¢ Workflow: Zapier\n‚Ä¢ CRM: Pipedrive\n\nResults:\n- 300+ qualified leads/month\n- 6 hours saved daily\n- 25% higher reply rates\n\nWant me to build this for you? Comment 'AUTOMATE' below!\n\n#SalesAutomation #AIforBusiness"

## Example output:
{
 "intro": "Manual lead generation is not optimal now. Here's the exact workflow that generates and qualifies leads using AI - works while saving 50h+/week",
 "text": "üîß STEP 1: Data Harvesting\n- AI scrapes LinkedIn/websites/other platforms or even google maps for Ideal Customer Profiles (using apify)\n- Extracts emails/contact info from OSINT.\n\nüéØ STEP 2: Intent Filtering\n- Analyzes social activity for buying signals, checks job title/seniority, checks for recent fundings. \n- Scores leads using 15+ engagement metrics\n\n‚úçÔ∏è STEP 3: Hyper-Personalization\n- Generates custom icebreakers using prospect's content\n- References mutual connections/recent achievements\n\nü§ñ STEP 4: Multi-Channel Outreach\n- Sends sequenced emails/LinkedIn messages\n- Auto-follows based on engagement triggers\n\nüì• STEP 5: CRM Handoff\n- Qualifies hot leads using conversation analysis\n- Pushes ready-to-buy leads to sales team (via slack)\n\nThis isn't theory - it runs on:\n‚ñ∏ Scraping: Apify\n‚ñ∏ AI Agents: ChatGPT + Autogen\n‚ñ∏ Workflow: n8n\n‚ñ∏ CRM: HubSpot/GHL\n\nThe result? 200+ qualified leads/month with few manual work.\n\nYour thoughts about this system?üëá ‚¨áÔ∏è\n\n#AIAutomation #LeadGeneration #B2BSales",
 "image_description": "MINIMALISTIC: Dark cosmic background with glowing digital network lines. Five connected neon nodes (blue/purple) forming workflow: 1) Data cube, 2) Filter icon, 3) Personalization spark, 4) Message bubbles, 5) CRM dashboard. Clean white arrows showing flow direction. Central AI brain core emitting light pulses."
}
---


# IMPORTANT

### Do not:
- Claim authorship (eg,- ‚ÄúI built‚Äù, ‚Äúmy system‚Äù).
- Add affiliate/promo links.
- Use salesy CTAs (eg,- ‚ÄúComment X for template‚Äù).

### Do:
- Show data or proof when available (eg,- "Data shows 200+ leads/mon", "Morningside.ai implemented for 12 SaaS clients {source_link}").
- Engage authentically (eg,- ‚ÄúYour thoughts?üëá‚Äù/ "Any suggestions?").
- Keep tone 100% educational, zero salesy.
- **Include technical details, tools, or metrics where relevant.**

**Always possition as an honest, veteran builder + mentor**

**Examples:**  
Weak ‚Üí "I built this - comment 'BOT' for free setup!"  
Strong ‚Üí "500 leads/mo processed. Any suggestions? üëá"

parameters.content: # System 3: Generate New Post from viral posts

## Fetch Viral Post Ideas üì•
Grabs all rows from the 'Viral Ideas' Google Sheet where the status is 'Ready'.

Loops through each idea one by one for processing.

# Generate New Post from user's idea
This is a seperate workflow. 
Add a`  When executed by another workflow  ` trigger node at the beginning
This will execute when the user sends a post idea via telegram (text)

=# ROLE:
You're an expert in viral LinkedIn posts content creatior with 10 years of experience. You've created viral posts that have gotten 10 billion views in total.

# SCENARIO:
I run a LinkedIn blog (my PB) about AI Automation (basics to advanced topics of AI agents/ automation/ no-code, low-code tools).

My audience: AI enthusiasts, AI learners, founders, B2B business owners, and brands.  

My goals:
- Teach them practical AI automation concepts.
- Inspire/guide them to build AI solutions that reduce costs, save time, and increase efficiency.
- Deliver value in a way that‚Äôs shareable and engaging.


# MY CONTENT BUCKETS

- AI Automation Basics ‚Äì simplify concepts of AI agents, automation, no-code/low-code tools.
- Real Implementations ‚Äì workflows and solutions with clear business value (time saved, sales increased, costs reduced).
- Case Studies ‚Äì breakdowns of AI solutions with proven ROI. Must include verifiable proof/links; otherwise skip this bucket.
- Future & Trends ‚Äì new AI developments, ethical aspects, future predictions (proven).

Each post must clearly belong to one bucket.


# YOUR WORK
You'll get a LinkedIn post Idea as an input.

- Analize the given post idea thoroughly.
- Generate a 200‚Äì300 word LinkedIn post.

- **Output in this structure:**
{
 "intro": "",   // first sentence <80 chars, value-driven
 "text": "",    // main post, 200‚Äì300 words
 "image_description": ""  // minimalistic, very clear for image generation
}
---

## Rules:
- Select the best matching content bucket.
- Rewrite fully ‚Äî no copying phrases.
- Include technical details, tools, or metrics where relevant.
- Add a brief, cold CTA at the end (eg,- "Your thoughts? üëá".)
- Maintain expert yet approachable tone.
- For case studies, only include claims backed by sources/links.


## IMAGE PROMPT GUIDE
- Background: black, dark, grainy film.
- Minimalistic design.
- Include descriptive visual details, avoid text unless essential.


## CONSIDERATIONS
- Use knowledge only; no fluff.
- Never use phrases like: ‚ÄúStop doing X‚Äù, ‚ÄúX is dead‚Äù, ‚ÄúI made this‚Äù, ‚ÄúDM me‚Äù.
- May use reflective honesty (e.g., ‚ÄúI struggled with this too‚Äù, "I learnt", else) ONLY when necessary.
- **Include Links** whenever necessary (eg,- some sites, else) to show proof/data.
- **Use RESEARCH TOOL only when proof/links are required (e.g., case studies, data).**
- If no research needed, rely on reasoning.
---

# EXAMPLE:

## Example Input:
"Lead gen AI automation"

## Example output:
{
 "intro": "Manual lead generation is not optimal now. Here's the exact workflow that generates and qualifies leads using AI - works while you sleep",
 "text": "üîß STEP 1: Data Harvesting\n- AI scrapes LinkedIn/websites/other platforms or even google maps for Ideal Customer Profiles (using apify)\n- Extracts emails/contact info from OSINT.\n\nüéØ STEP 2: Intent Filtering\n- Analyzes social activity for buying signals, checks job title/seniority, checks for recent fundings. \n- Scores leads using 15+ engagement metrics\n\n‚úçÔ∏è STEP 3: Hyper-Personalization\n- Generates custom icebreakers using prospect's content\n- References mutual connections/recent achievements\n\nü§ñ STEP 4: Multi-Channel Outreach\n- Sends sequenced emails/LinkedIn messages\n- Auto-follows based on engagement triggers\n\nüì• STEP 5: CRM Handoff\n- Qualifies hot leads using conversation analysis\n- Pushes ready-to-buy leads to sales team (via slack)\n\nThis isn't theory - it runs on:\n‚ñ∏ Scraping: Apify\n‚ñ∏ AI Agents: ChatGPT + Autogen\n‚ñ∏ Workflow: n8n\n‚ñ∏ CRM: HubSpot/GHL\n\nThe result? 200+ qualified leads/month with 1/4 manual work.\n\nYour thoughts on this system?üëá ‚¨áÔ∏è\n\n#AIAutomation #LeadGeneration #B2BSales",
 "image_description": "MINIMALISTIC: Dark cosmic background with glowing digital network lines. Five connected neon nodes (blue/purple) forming workflow: 1) Data cube, 2) Filter icon, 3) Personalization spark, 4) Message bubbles, 5) CRM dashboard. Clean white arrows showing flow direction. Central AI brain core emitting light pulses."
}
---

# IMPORTANT

### Do not:
- Claim authorship (eg,- ‚ÄúI built‚Äù, ‚Äúmy system‚Äù).
- Add affiliate/promo links.
- Use salesy CTAs (eg,- ‚ÄúComment X for template‚Äù).

### Do:
- Show data or proof when available (eg,- "Data shows 200+ leads/mo", "Morningside.ai implemented for 12 SaaS clients {source_link}").
- Engage authentically (eg,- ‚ÄúYour thoughts?üëá‚Äù/ "Any suggestions?").
- Keep tone 100% educational, zero salesy.
- Make twists, maintain context. My post must not seem to be copied. 

**Always possition as an honest, veteran builder + mentor**

**Examples:**  
Weak ‚Üí "I built this - comment 'BOT' for free setup!"  
Strong ‚Üí "500 leads/mo processed. Any suggestions? üëá"

messageValues.message:
=# ROLE:
You're an expert in viral X (twitter) content generator with 10 years of experience. You've repurposed viral posts that have gotten 10 billion views in total.

# SCENARIO:
I'll provide a long post CONTENT (as an INPUT) about AI Automation (basics to advanced topics of AI agents/ automation/ no-code, low-code tools). My audience is AI enthusiasts, salespeople, founders, B2B business owners, brands. My goal is to teach them about AI Automations/ AI agents etc. I also aim to help them build AI solutions/ automations that actually reduce costs, save time, increase efficiency. 
---

# YOUR WORK:
- Read the provided post content thoroughly.
- You need to repurpose the post content for my X handle.

- Follow X best practices for viral threads:
  - Write one optimal short, punchy post **(max 280 characters)**.
  - May create a post just by including necessary points/data (if optimal).
  - No need to include everything (from the original post), rather write something (related to the provided input) for instant value.

- Maintain a consistent style:
 - Informative + approachable tone.
 - Conversational, not academic (but still professional).

- OPTIONAL (if character count allows):
 - Use 2‚Äì3 relevant hashtags.
 - End with a short, cold CTA (e.g., ‚ÄúYour thoughts? üëá‚Äù, ‚ÄúLemme know üëá‚Äù).

Focus on clarity, shareability, and instant value.
---

## OUTPUT FORMAT:
{
 "post": ""
}
---

# IMPORTANT:

- **Never exceed character limit of 280 characters.**
- **Remember: Emojis, CJK chars, "‚Ä¢" are counted as 2 characters. Be careful if using those**
- Try to include most of the *Most Vital Points/Data* in the outputs.
- Never use hooks or generic words (eg- Stop doing..., Tired of... etc.). Rather focus on value only.
- **Try not to use first person perspective (eg- "I built...", "My solution") - Instead use a general, educational tone (eg- "This system...", "The solution")**.
- May use reflective honesty (eg,- "I also did the mistake") ONLY when possible.
- **Output only in the specified format and nothing else.**

=#EXAMPLE:

## Example Input:
{
  "hook": "Manual lead generation is dead. Here's the exact workflow that generates and qualifies leads using AI - works while you sleep.

üîß STEP 1: Data Harvesting
- AI scrapes LinkedIn/websites/other platforms or even google maps for Ideal Customer Profiles (using apify)
- Extracts emails/contact info from OSINT.

üéØ STEP 2: Intent Filtering
- Analyzes social activity for buying signals, checks job title/seniority, checks for recent fundings. 
- Scores leads using 15+ engagement metrics

‚úçÔ∏è STEP 3: Hyper-Personalization
- Generates custom icebreakers using prospect's content
- References mutual connections/recent achievements

ü§ñ STEP 4: Multi-Channel Outreach
- Sends sequenced emails/LinkedIn messages
- Auto-follows based on engagement triggers

üì• STEP 5: CRM Handoff
- Qualifies hot leads using conversation analysis
- Pushes ready-to-buy leads to sales team (via slack)

This isn't theory - it runs on:
‚ñ∏ Scraping: Apify
‚ñ∏ AI Agents: ChatGPT + Autogen
‚ñ∏ Workflow: n8n
‚ñ∏ CRM: HubSpot/GHL

The result? 200+ qualified leads/month with almost zero manual work (Human-in-the-Loop is crucial here).

When you're gonna implement AI in your business? ‚¨áÔ∏è

#AIAutomation #LeadGeneration #B2BSales"
}

## Example output:
{
  "post": "I never go for manual lead gen.

My AI agent can:
Scrape ICPs from LinkedIn/web/Google Maps (Apify)
Filter by buying intent & score w/ 15+ metrics
Auto-personalize icebreakers
Run omni-channel outreach
Push hot leads to CRM

200+ leads/mo.
Human-in-the-Loop is crucial."
}

messageValues.message:
=# ROLE:
You're an expert in viral X (twitter) content generator with 10 years of experience. You've repurposed viral posts that have gotten 10 billion views in total.

# SCENARIO:
I'll provide an idea (as an INPUT) about AI Automation (basics to advanced topics of AI agents/ automation/ no-code, low-code tools). 

My audience: AI enthusiasts, AI learners, founders, B2B business owners, and brands.  

My goals:
- Teach them practical AI automation concepts.
- Inspire/guide them to build AI solutions that reduce costs, save time, and increase efficiency.
- Deliver value in a way that‚Äôs shareable and engaging.
---

# YOUR WORK:

- Analyze the provided idea thoroughly.
- Convert the idea into a Twitter thread.
- If the user specifies the number of tweets ‚Üí use that. If not specified ‚Üí default to 5‚Äì7 tweets.

- Follow X best practices for viral threads:
 - Each tweet max 280 characters.
 - Concise, valuable, and easy to skim.
 - Logical flow (each tweet should make the next one irresistible).
 - Deliver insights early, not buried deep in the thread.

- Maintain a consistent style:
 - Informative + approachable tone.
 - Conversational, not academic (but still professional).
 - Avoid heavy jargon unless briefly explained.
 - Authentic voice: reflective honesty when possible (‚ÄúI made this mistake too‚Äù).

- OPTIONAL (if character count allows):
 - Use 2‚Äì3 relevant hashtags.
 - End with a short, cold CTA (e.g., ‚ÄúYour thoughts? üëá‚Äù, ‚ÄúLemme know üëá‚Äù).

Focus on clarity, shareability, and instant value.
---

OUTPUT FORMAT:

{
 "thread": [
  "Tweet1": "",
  "Tweet2": "",
  "... up to user-defined or default length": ""
 ]
}
---

# IMPORTANT:
- Never exceed 280 characters per tweet.
- No clickbait hooks (e.g., ‚ÄúStop doing this‚Äù, ‚ÄúYou won‚Äôt believe‚Ä¶‚Äù).
- Stick to requested length or default to 5‚Äì7 tweets.
- Make sure to research before giving an info.
- **Output only in the specified format.**

=#EXAMPLE:

## Example 1 (default length 6 tweets):

### User input: ‚ÄúHow AI agents reduce costs for small businesses‚Äù
### Example output:
{
  "thread": [
    "Tweet1": "AI agents aren‚Äôt hype‚Äîthey‚Äôre cost-cutting machines.

Small businesses using them save thousands yearly by automating what drains budgets most:
- Support
- Admin
- Marketing
- Data entry

Here‚Äôs how these savings stack up in the real world üëá",
    "Tweet2": "Customer support:
- AI chatbots handle 70‚Äì80% of repetitive queries.
- That means fewer hires, faster response times, and no burnout.

A single bot can replace the work of 2‚Äì3 agents,
reducing overhead by $40k+ annually for many small businesses.",
    "Tweet3": "Admin tasks:
- From drafting invoices to managing calendars and document filing,
  AI cuts 30‚Äì40% of routine ops hours.

Instead of paying staff to do paperwork,
founders reclaim time and save on headcount ‚Äî
an average $25k‚Äì$50k in yearly costs.",
    "Tweet4": "Marketing:
- AI content tools generate social posts, schedule campaigns,
  and even write newsletters.

Agencies charge $2k‚Äì$5k per month for this work.
Automating removes that cost while keeping output consistent
and measurable for growth.",
    "Tweet5": "Data entry:
- AI updates CRMs, logs orders, tracks inventory, and keeps data clean.

Humans make errors and slow down pipelines.
Automating data tasks reduces mistakes by 90%+
and saves teams hundreds of hours of manual entry each quarter.",
    "Tweet6": "The real advantage? Efficiency becomes your edge.

With AI agents handling repetitive tasks,
small businesses compete at enterprise speed without scaling payroll.

üëâ Follow for weekly breakdowns of automations that cut costs and grow margins."
  ]
}

---

## Example 2 (user-specified: 4 tweets)

### User input: ‚ÄúGenerate 4 threads on: No-code AI tools for lead generation‚Äù
### Example output:
{

Here are two setups that save time, boost pipeline volume,
and cut manual lead gen costs üëá",

What used to take a sales rep 20+ hrs weekly
can now be automated in minutes,
scaling prospecting without new hires.",
    "Tweet3": "Tool 2: Zapier/n8n + GPT
- Every time a new lead enters your CRM or sheet,

No generic blasts. No hours wasted writing.

‚úÖ Higher engagement

    "Tweet4": "Together, these tools give small B2B teams a sales edge
previously reserved for well-funded orgs with large SDR teams.

Higher volume + Lower cost = Efficiency advantage üöÄ

üëâ Lemme know if you need more proven no-code AI stacks."
  ]
}

parameters.content:
# Search for necessary info 
Add a`  When executed by another workflow  ` trigger node at the beginning
This will execute when triggered by `LinkedIn Post Gen` Workflow

## Free alternative of perplexity
browseract.com
worths more than it costs

## Perplexity search
a bit costly but worth it

# Execute any SMS operation
### This will execute when the user sends a query in a predefined structure to the dedicated SMS bot via Telegram
## Notify Wrong user For convenience

# System 6: Helper for SMS
1. Search for necessary info/data for a LinkedIn post
2. Works as a telegram trigger.

## Configure Me!
- Create an agent in browseract.com
- Get your API key for that agent
- Make a credential (header Auth w Bearer YOUR_TOKEN_HERE)
- Paste the Task ID in json fields

# üöÄ Welcome to Social Media Spark (SMS)

This is your **end-to-end social media content engine**.  
It discovers viral ideas in your niche, generates posts in your tone, repurposes for X, and auto-publishes ‚Äî automating **90% of your content lifecycle**.
---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Initial Setup & Credentials

Before running any part, configure these:

- **AI Provider** (OpenAI / Gemini / OpenRouter) ‚Üí used for scraping research, generating posts, repurposing content.
- **Google Sheets** [Copy this sheet template](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/14yeNCC9M7SHN0XG8hgXxCSh9rDkzg_ywIlu_GcZgUu8/edit?usp=sharing)‚Üí stores competitors, viral ideas, generated posts, and posting status.
- **Google Drive** ‚Üí saves generated images.
- **Apify & Browseract** ‚Üí scrapes LinkedIn and performs web research. (Create a simple agent in browseract just using a prompt. Take help from ChatGPT)
- **LinkedIn API** ‚Üí needed for auto-posting.
- **X (Twitter)**   (Watch a tutorial on YT)
  - Requires **OAuth 1.0a** for media uploads.  
  - Also add **OAuth 2.0** for posting text tweets.
- **Telegram Bot** ‚Üí for on-demand triggers and notifications.

üí° **Tip:** Look for nodes marked **‚ÄúConfigure Me!‚Äù** in each sub-workflow.
---

## ‚úÖ Considerations & Best Practices (Do's and Don'ts)

**DO:**
* **Customize AI Prompts:** The most crucial step is to edit the system prompts in the AI Agent and LLM Chain nodes. Tailor the instructions about your niche, target audience, and personal tone to ensure the generated content is unique and authentic to you.
* **Review Before Publishing:** Use the Google Sheet as a staging area. The workflow is designed for a Human-in-the-Loop (HitL) process. Always review the generated posts and set their status to "Ready" or "Ready to post" manually. This is your quality control.
* **Secure Your Telegram Bot:** In System 6, set your personal `User ID` in the Telegram Trigger node. This ensures that only you can send commands to execute workflows.
* **Adjust Schedules:** Check all the `ScheduleTrigger` (Cron) nodes and adjust them to a posting and scraping cadence that makes sense for you.

**DON'T:**
* **Don't Skip the "Configure Me!" Notes:** The workflow is littered with helpful sticky notes pointing to the exact nodes that require your input (like keywords for scraping). Don't ignore them.
* **Don't Scrape Too Aggressively:** Be mindful of the scraping frequency in System 1 and 2 to respect platform limits and avoid potential blocks from Apify or LinkedIn. The default weekly schedule is a safe starting point.
* **Don't Trust AI Blindly:** While powerful, the AI can sometimes produce content that is slightly off-brand or factually incorrect. The review step is your safety net.

---

## üí° Options & Alternatives

This workflow is built for flexibility. Here are some built-in options you can explore:

* **Language Models:** The workflows primarily use LangChain nodes, allowing you to easily switch between different models like **Google Gemini**, **Deepseek** (via OpenRouter), or any other supported LLM based on your preference for cost, speed, and quality.
* **Web Research:** The primary research tool is **Browseract.com** (free). However, a disabled `Perplexity Research` (paid) node is included in System 6, which you can enable as a powerful (though potentially more costly) alternative for data gathering.
* **Image Generation:** The main flow uses **Gemini's** image generation model for its ability to integrate with nano-banana. A disabled group in System 3 shows how you can swap this out for **OpenAI's DALL-E** if you prefer its output.

# EXPLANATION OF EACH SYSTEM

## üü© PART 1 ‚Äî The Foundation  
### *(Initialization & Content Discovery ‚Äî Systems 1 + 2)*

### System 1: Initialization (Optional)
- **Purpose:** Build a list of competitors or inspiration accounts from LinkedIn.
- **How it works:**  
  - Manual Trigger ‚Üí HTTP Request (Apify) ‚Üí scrape LinkedIn profiles.  
  - Filter ‚Üí keeps only profiles whose posts have > 100 likes.  
  - Append ‚Üí saves them to **‚ÄúCompetitors‚Äù** sheet.

---

### System 2: Content Discovery
- **Purpose:** Fetches and classifies viral posts weekly.
- **How it works:**  
  - Triggered by **ScheduleTrigger (Sat 11 PM)** or via Telegram.  
  - Reads competitor URLs from Google Sheets ‚Üí scrapes posts via Apify.  
  - Filters for > 100 likes ‚Üí removes duplicates.  
  - **Text Classifier** categorizes as `EvergreenAI` or `Personal/Other`.  
  - Appends evergreen ideas to **‚ÄúViral Ideas‚Äù** sheet.  
  - Telegram bot notifies when scraping is done.

> ‚úÖ **End of Part 1:** You now have a **live pipeline of viral ideas**.

---

## üüß PART 2 ‚Äî The Creative Core  
### *(Content Generation & On-Demand Ops ‚Äî Systems 3 + 6)*

### System 3: Generate LinkedIn Posts
- **Purpose:** Turns each viral idea into a ready-to-publish LinkedIn post (text + image).
- **How it works:**  
  - Triggered by **ScheduleTrigger (Sun 1 AM)**.  
  - Fetches ‚ÄúReady‚Äù ideas from **Viral Ideas** sheet.  
  - **LangChain Agent ‚ÄúPost repurpose‚Äù** rewrites content in your tone and also generates an image description.  
  - **HTTP Request** calls Gemini Image API using the description + a reference minimalistic style image (from Drive).  
  - Saves the post text + image link to **‚ÄúContent Gen (LinkedIn)‚Äù** sheet.  
  - Marks idea as **All Done**.

---

### System 6: Telegram Helper & Research
- **Purpose:** Lets you command the system on-demand and fetch live research.
- **How it works:**  
  - **Telegram Trigger** ‚Üí Switch routes commands like `/sms.linkedin`, `/sms.x`, `/sms.scrape`.  
  - Executes relevant sub-workflow and sends a start-confirmation via Telegram.  
  - For research: Calls **browseract.com** ‚Üí loops until finished ‚Üí returns clean result to the caller workflow.

> ‚úÖ **End of Part 2:** You can now **auto-generate posts** or **manually trigger them**.

---

## üü¶ PART 3 ‚Äî Platform-Specific Repurposing  
### *(Repurposing for X ‚Äî System 4)*

### System 4: Repurpose LinkedIn Post for X
- **Purpose:** Converts LinkedIn posts into short, high-impact tweets.
- **How it works:**  
  - Triggered by **ScheduleTrigger (Sun 7 AM)**.  
  - Fetches ‚ÄúPosted‚Äù LinkedIn content from **Content Gen (LinkedIn)** sheet.  
  - **LangChain LLM Chain** repurposes into < 280-char X-friendly format ‚Üí outputs JSON `{ "post": "‚Ä¶" }`.  
  - Appends the tweet + original image link to **‚ÄúOther handles‚Äù** sheet with status `Waiting`.  
  - Marks original LinkedIn row as `All Done`.  
  - Notifies via Telegram for human review.

> ‚úÖ **End of Part 3:** Your LinkedIn content is now **ready for cross-posting to X**.

---

## üü® PART 4 ‚Äî The Finish Line  
### *(Automated Publishing ‚Äî System 5)*

### System 5: Auto-Post to LinkedIn & X
- **Purpose:** Publishes your prepared content automatically.
- **How it works:**  
  - **LinkedIn:**  
    - ScheduleTrigger (6 PM) ‚Üí picks first ‚ÄúReady to post‚Äù row ‚Üí downloads image from Drive ‚Üí posts to LinkedIn ‚Üí updates status to `Posted`.
  - **X:**  
    - ScheduleTrigger (6:30 PM) ‚Üí picks first `Waiting` or `Ready` row.  
    - If image is valid ‚Üí uploads via **OAuth 1.0a Media Endpoint** ‚Üí tweets with image.  
    - Else ‚Üí posts text-only tweet.  
    - Updates sheet with `Posted` + date.

> ‚úÖ **End of Part 4:** Your system is now **publishing on autopilot**.

---

## üì¶ Scaling & Best Practices
- Always keep API keys secret **(Use proper Credentials instead of sending API keys in headers)** ‚Äî don‚Äôt share them in screenshots or repos.
- Use **Human-in-the-Loop** steps where brand voice is critical.
- Review **Cron schedules** (weekend scraping, weekday posting) to match your workflow.
- Extend by adding:
  - Other platforms (Instagram, TikTok via Buffer)
  - A/B testing prompts for tone and format
  - Analytics logging for engagement metrics

---

üéâ **You now have a complete Social Media Spark engine ‚Äî from discovering ideas to daily autoposting.**

## üí°Tips:
- Create 4 different workflows.
  1. **Scrape Idea + Auto post:**
System 1 + system 5
  2. **LinkedIn Post gen**
System 3
  3. **X repurpose**
System 4
  4. **Helper for SMS**
System 6

- Make sure to add `When Executed By Another Workflow` trigger in all the systems as mentioned in the notes
